{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the symptoms described (numbness in hands and feet, generalized weakness, constipation) and the radiographic findings (linear lines on metaphyses of knee and wrist joints), the most likely diagnosis for this patient is rickets. Rickets is a condition characterized by impaired mineralization of growing bones, typically due to vitamin D deficiency.
